subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
lead_paragraph: Although the championship has been held before in domed football stadiums, this will be the first one played entirely “in the round,” with the court in the center of the arena floor.
snippet: Although the championship has been held before in domed football stadiums, this will be the first one played entirely “in the round,” with the court in the center of the arena floor.
